prompts: Create a cute aquatic Pokemon that resembles a small, round seal with a playful demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that has a blue, round body and is known for its love of the ocean.
Design a Pokemon with a soft, icy appearance and a friendly personality found in snowy regions.
Imagine a Pokemon that rolls around playfully, resembling a spherical creature from the sea.
Generate an adorable Pokemon with a round belly and a happy face, perfect for children's games.
Make a Pokemon that has blubbery features and swims gracefully, with bright blue colors.
Give me a water-type Pokemon that enjoys sliding on ice and has a joyful expression.
